text:
Both work, but local development adds benefits like:

1) integration with git
2) possibility of using IDE extensions 

An optimal mix is doing both via the HubSpot CLI (see the hs watch / hs fetch <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli?uuid=88dca395-1dfe-4418-b543-10cea116a8ae|commands>) and <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/github-integration?uuid=9d29fdf5-6ec5-4e8c-bc4c-605ef9663a73|continuous integration with github> which includes automatic deployments.
Confirmed that I’ve encountered this multiple times. This isn’t the only documented value that spits an error — I believe that both `standard_emphasis` and `advanced_emphasis` also error out.
